name: The Mortal Instruments tumblr dash theme
description: A Tumblr dashboard theme inspired by The Mortal Instruments books (and upcoming film: City of Bones) by Cassandra Clare. Dash theme comes with background, custom log in page, and 'back to top' icon replacement. "New Post" icons, tumblr logo replacement, and dash navigation can be found here to complete the look: post icons / tumblr logo / dash navigation

user.name: kickitintheslash
user.about: I run a Supernatural blog on tumblr at kickitintheslash and a THG/TMI/HP blog at oneoftheclave.
